span.p: GESD provides educational services to more than 11,000 students in grades kindergarten through eighth grade in 17 schools. The Districts 1,500 employees are focused on meeting the needs of our diverse student body. This includes more than 750 certificated employees, over 650 support personnel and 54 school site, support and District Office administrators.
